text: I love their prices. 6-8 bucks for a whole pizza! And the employees are friendly. Place is clean. You can shop while you wait but they usually have a hot pizza or 2 already done in the warmer. It's always quick and friendly. And you get Kmart points for eating there!

name: Lloyd Wolford
text: This is a full operational Little Caesars Pizzeria located in a K-Mart.  They have a daily lunch special or you can order a pizza to go. All the normal special daily deals don't start till 4 pm .

Little Caesar's is another pizza I wont eat again.
